    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The ID of the SAML installation provider. Could be one of `saml-idp-descriptor`, `keycloak-saml`, `saml-sp-descriptor`, `keycloak-saml-subsystem`, `mod-auth-mellon`, etc.
{{% /md %}}</dd>
